params.name: sha
params.description: SHA or branch to start listing commits from.

params.name: path
params.description: Only commits containing this file path will be returned.

params.name: author
params.description: GitHub login or email address by which to filter by commit author.

params.name: since
params.description: Only commits after this date will be returned. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

params.name: until
params.description: Only commits before this date will be returned. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
